statements: REVOKE INSERT ON predictive_analytics_table FROM user1
REVOKE UPDATE(prediction) ON predictive_analytics_table FROM user2
REVOKE SELECT(customer_id, prediction) ON predictive_analytics_table FROM user3
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT ON Customer FROM user1;
REVOKE UPDATE, DELETE ON PurchaseHistory FROM user2;
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON Customer, PurchaseHistory FROM user3;
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE ON customer_data FROM user1;
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON purchase_history FROM user2;
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON product_catalog FROM user3;
REVOKE INSERT ON customers FROM user1;
REVOKE DELETE ON transactions FROM user2;
REVOKE UPDATE ON products FROM user3;
